Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote")
local ClubMeshData = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=82264918" local ClubTextureData = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=82265067"
local ShieldMeshData = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh").MeshId local ShieldTextureData = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh").TextureId
local AttackAble = true local AttackReload = 1.25 local AttackWindow = 0.5 local AttackDamaging = false local AttackDamage = 15 local AttackSlowing = false local AttackSlow = 0.5 local AttackSlowDuration = 1
local SlowScript = Tool:WaitForChild("SlowScript")
local Shield local ShieldEquipping = false
function toggleShield(on) if on then ShieldEquipping = true
Shield = Instance.new("Part") Shield.CanCollide = false Shield.FormFactor = "Symmetric" Shield.Size = Vector3.new(3, 5, 2)
local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" mesh.MeshId = ShieldMeshData mesh.TextureId = ShieldTextureData mesh.Parent = Shield
Shield.Parent = Tool.Parent
local larm = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if larm then local weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Part0 = larm weld.Part1 = Shield weld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -1, 0) * CFrame.Angles(-0.4, 0.2, -0.6) weld.Parent = weld.Part0 end
Shield.Touched:connect(onShieldTouched)
ShieldEquipping = false else if Shield then Shield:Destroy() end end end
function onEquipped() if ShieldEquipping then return end
onUnequipped()
--make a shield toggleShield(true)
--change the mesh local mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh") mesh.MeshId = ClubMeshData mesh.TextureId = ClubTextureData end
function onUnequipped() --change the mesh back local mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh") mesh.MeshId = ShieldMeshData mesh.TextureId = ShieldTextureData
--remove the shield toggleShield(false) end
function getPlayer() local char = Tool.Parent local player = game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayerFromCharacter(char) return player end
function tagHuman(human) local val = Instance.new("ObjectValue") val.Name = "creator" val.Value = getPlayer() val.Parent = human game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(val, 1) end
function onShieldTouched(part) if not AttackSlowing then return end if part:IsDescendantOf(Tool.Parent) then return end
if part.Parent and part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then local human = part.Parent.Humanoid
local slow = SlowScript:Clone() slow.Percentage.Value = AttackSlow slow.Duration.Value = AttackSlowDuration slow.Parent = human slow.Disabled = false
AttackSlowing = false end end
function onTouched(part) if not AttackDamaging then return end if part:IsDescendantOf(Tool.Parent) then return end
if part.Parent and part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then local human = part.Parent.Humanoid tagHuman(human) human:TakeDamage(AttackDamage) AttackDamaging = false end end
function onAttack() if not AttackAble then return end
--rest AttackAble = false delay(AttackReload, function() AttackAble = true end)
--open damage window AttackDamaging = true AttackSlowing = true delay(AttackWindow, function() AttackDamaging = false AttackSlowing = false end)
--animate Remote:FireClient(getPlayer(), "PlayAnimation", "ShieldBash") end
function onRemote(player, func, ...) if not player == getPlayer() then return end
if func == "Attack" then onAttack() end end
Remote.OnServerEvent:connect(onRemote) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Handle.Touched:connect(onTouched)

local Player = game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer local Mouse = Player:GetMouse()
local Tool = script.Parent local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote")
local CAS = game:GetService("ContextActionService") local ActionName = "RiotShield"
local WalkTrack
function playAnimation(animationName, fadeTime, weight, speed) local anim = Tool:FindFirstChild(animationName) if anim ~= nil then local char = Player.Character if char and char:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then local human = char.Humanoid local track = human:LoadAnimation(anim)
track:Play(fadeTime, weight, speed) end end end
function onAction(actionName, inputState, inputObject) if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer("Attack") end end
function toggleWalkTrack(on) if on then local anim = Tool:WaitForChild("ShieldWalk") local char = Player.Character if char and char:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then local human = char.Humanoid WalkTrack = human:LoadAnimation(anim) WalkTrack:Play(1) end else if WalkTrack then WalkTrack:Stop() end end end
function onEquipped() onUnequipped()
CAS:BindActionToInputTypes( ActionName, onAction, false, Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1, Enum.UserInputType.Touch )
toggleWalkTrack(true) end
function onUnequipped() CAS:UnbindAction(ActionName)
toggleWalkTrack(false) end
function onRemote(func, ...) if func == "PlayAnimation" then playAnimation(...) end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Remote.OnClientEvent:connect(onRemote)

local Human = script.Parent local Percent = script:WaitForChild("Percentage") local Duration = script:WaitForChild("Duration") local Delta = Human.WalkSpeed * Percent.Value
Human.WalkSpeed = Human.WalkSpeed - Delta wait(Duration.Value) Human.WalkSpeed = Human.WalkSpeed + Delta
game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(script, 0)
